name: 0. boost AI bonus
description: The boost AI commonly used by the community is universal in the full size of random maps and takes effect at 200% difficulty. The experience of computer heroes is 1.6 times, and the weekly production of town creatures is 1.3 times.

chinese.name: 0. boost AI bonus
chinese.description: 社区通常使用的boost AI，随机地图全尺寸通用，200%难度下生效，电脑英雄经验1.6倍，城镇生物周产1.3倍。

author: Nordsoft, val-gaav
